mapper.select:
select
from SAMS_STUDENT where ACTIVE_FLAG = '1'
and STUDENT_NO=#{studentNo}
and STUDENT_NAME like '%${studentName}%'
mapper.delete:
delete from SAMS_STUDENT where STUDENT_ID in
#{item}
mapper.insert: insert into SAMS_STUDENT (STUDENT_ID, STUDENT_NO, STUDENT_NAME, SEX, BIRTH_DATE, START_TIME, FINISH_TIME, REMARK, ACTIVE_FLAG, CREATED_BY, CREATION_TIME, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFICATION_TIME, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modificationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SAMS_STUDENT
STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENT_NAME = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINISH_TIME = #{finishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EXT2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT3 = #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where STUDENT_ID = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SAMS_STUDENT set STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENT_NAME = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINISH_TIME = #{finishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_FLAG = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIED_BY = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFICATION_TIME = #{modificationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXT1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT3 = #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where STUDENT_ID = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
